name: beautiful-pastebin
description: The vim plugin script used for copying code directly from pastebin to your vim text editor
install_details:
Step 1) Install BeautifulSoup http://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/ 
step 2) Download the beautiful-pastebin.zip and extract it and copy bin.vim and beautiful.py in ~/.vim/plugin

Note :if ~/.vim/plugin is not there than create it
